name: Araknifoe
overview: A fun and original shoot em up in which you have to knock the incoming spiders back down the bath drainhole before they kill you. At the end of each level you get an amusing sub-game where you have to waggle left and right to reach the next level. This was released in both Commodore Disk User 1989/03-04, as well as Your Commodore 1990/02 (Tape #02)
